item.description:
We have great weather forecast for this weekend, lets get out there and enjoy it. I will lead a short, beginner hike lasting about 3 to 4 miles at the scenic Fells Reservation, just north of Boston. The trail will wind up and down but there are no sustained uphills. I suggest hiking shoes, wind breaker, snacks and plenty of water.

In the next few weeks we will run some progressively more difficult hikes. This is a great way to get back into hiking shape if you have taken some time off.

We will meet at the Sheepfold parking lot at 9am sharp on Saturday morning. For Map of the Fells Reservation check out:
http://www.fells.org/...
item.how_to_find_us: I will stand near the main trailhead map.
item.name: Beginner Hike in the Fells
